Articles.Content:
Hey There,

at first, thank you for this great epic game.

I have purchased the game at Gog.com. When i start the patcher i have to confirm my email and passwort. But i havent an account on the ksp store.

How i can patch my gog-game?

Pleas help

1. Wait for a couple of weeks, till lazy asses at gog.com update the game in their store.
  2. Re-download whole game from their site, since they don't usually put a patch there.
  3. Re-install everything. 
  4. Be happy it took ONLY two weeks. 

Buying KSP at gog.com was one of the worst decisions I ever made...

1.1 was out the day after it was available on the KSP store.

1.1.1 is not going to show up on GOG.com's patcher, at the request of Squad - they found serious bugs in 1.1.1 and requested GOG hold it off until a fix could be found.

 

I've usually gotten patches in a timely fashion via GOG.
